name: Robber Shooting Gun Escape
description:
Robber Shooting Gun Escape is best super market robbery game, especially for those who love fighting, mafia wars and gangster. A lot of thug missions are waiting for you, use your detective skills to rob through ATM, jewelry and super market store. Enter various places like security offices, super market office, ware houses and others. Be careful you need to fight security officers, policemen and target your enemies. enjoy multiple adventures in a single shooting and simulation game.
Features:
- Amazing 3D super market environment.
- High quality stunning graphics.
- Real thrill and action based on supermarket crimes game.
- Attack your enemies and police security staff.
- Spread terror and fear all over innocents.
